comments: There is a Kurepa-like conjecture (see A049782) for this sequence: for primes p>3, p does not divide a(p-1). However, the conjecture fails for p=20879. - _T. D. Noe_, Dec 08 2004
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100
formula: a(n) = sum(k=0...n, (n-k)!^2 ). - _Ross La Haye_, Sep 21 2004Recurrence: a(0) = 1, a(1) = 2, a(n) = (n^2+1)*a(n-1) - n^2*a(n-2). - _Vladimir Reshetnikov_, Oct 28 2015
prog: (PARI) { a=0; for (n=0, 100, write("b061062.txt", n, " ", a+=(n!)^2) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 17 2009
